PART 4 (OF 6),2005,6
Cable, Shatterstar and Co. encounter the evil of the ADMINISTRATOR and the terrible power of the WATCHTOWER. Which side will Sam and Spectre fight for? Guest starring WOLVERINE and DEADPOOL
column8: | penciller (cover):Rob Liefeld | writer:Fabian Nicieza | letterer:Rus Wooton
